town_description: Llinars del Vallès is a town and municipality in the region of Vallès Oriental. It is part of the geographical area of ​​Baix Montseny. The municipality extends from the southern foothills of the Montseny Massif to the Coastal Range. Rainfed agriculture predominates over irrigation, which proliferates only on the banks of the Mogent River. The forests are mostly Mediterranean (pines and holm oaks), although oaks and cork oaks also abound in the Coastal Range.
